languages.text: {n}Девушка кротко кивает, и одинокая слеза катится по ее щеке. Ее голос бесцветен:{/n} "Да... Он тот, кто обрек его на смерть."

traits.locale_text: {n}Лидзи кротко кивает, и одинокая слеза катится по ее щеке.{/n} "Но когда-то он был мне братом... А теперь на Тассере не осталось никого, кто любил бы меня. Кого я бы..." {n}Последнее она произносит одними губами.{/n}
traits.speaker: FW_Lizzy

languages.text: {n}The young woman nods meekly, and a single tear runs down her cheek. Her voice is hollow when she speaks:{/n} "You're right... He was the one who doomed him."
languages.original_text: {n}Девушка кротко кивает, и одинокая слеза катится по ее щеке. Ее голос бесцветен:{/n} "Да... Он тот, кто обрек его на смерть."

traits.locale_text: {n}The young woman nods meekly, and a single tear runs down her cheek. Her voice is hollow:{/n} "You're right... He was the one who doomed him."
{n}The young woman nods meekly, and a single tear runs down her cheek.{/n} "But he used... to be..." {n}The last words are barely audible.{/n}
{n}The young woman nods meekly, and a single tear runs down her cheek. Her voice is hollow when she speaks:{/n} "You're right... He was the one who doomed him."

{n}The young woman nods meekly, and a single tear runs down her cheek. Her voice is hollow:{/n} "You're right... He was the one who doomed him."

languages.text: {n}梅芙温顺地点着头，以空洞的声音开了口，一滴眼泪顺着她的脸颊流了下来。{/n}“您说得没错……是他自己害死了他。”
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman nods meekly, and a single tear runs down her cheek. Her voice is hollow when she speaks:{/n} "You're right... He was the one who doomed him."

traits.locale_text: {n}梅芙温顺地点着头，以空洞的声音开了口，一滴眼泪顺着她的脸颊流了下来。{/n}“您说得没错……是他自己害死了他。”
{n}梅芙温顺地点着头，一滴眼泪顺着脸颊流下来。{/n}“但他……曾经是……”{n}她哽咽道。{/n}

languages.text: {n}その若い女性はおとなしく頷き、一粒の涙が彼女の頬を流れる。彼女が口を開いたとき、その声には虚ろさがあった。{/n}「あなたの言うとおり…彼が、あの人を破滅させたんです」
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman nods meekly, and a single tear runs down her cheek. Her voice is hollow when she speaks:{/n} "You're right... He was the one who doomed him."

traits.locale_text: {n}その若い女性はおとなしく頷き、一粒の涙が彼女の頬を流れる。彼女が口を開いたとき、その声には虚ろさがあった。{/n}「あなたの言うとおり…彼が、あの人を破滅させたんです」

languages.text: {n}La muchacha asiente resignada, y una única lágrima resbala por su mejilla. Cuando por fin habla, su voz carece de emoción:{/n} «Es cierto... Fue él quien lo condenó».
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman nods meekly, and a single tear runs down her cheek. Her voice is hollow when she speaks:{/n} "You're right... He was the one who doomed him."

traits.locale_text: {n}La muchacha asiente resignada, y una única lágrima resbala por su mejilla. Cuando por fin habla, su voz carece de emoción:{/n} «Es cierto... Fue él quien lo condenó».
{n}La muchacha asiente resignada, y una única lágrima resbala por su mejilla.{/n} «Pero él... antes era...», {n}masculla.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yanağından tek bir gözyaşı süzülen genç kadın, usulca başını sallıyor. Konuşmaya başladığında sesi boğuk çıkıyor.{/n} "Doğru. Kendi etti, kendi buldu."
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman nods meekly, and a single tear runs down her cheek. Her voice is hollow when she speaks:{/n} "You're right... He was the one who doomed him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yanağından tek bir gözyaşı süzülen genç kadın, usulca başını sallıyor. Konuşmaya başladığında sesi boğuk çıkıyor.{/n} "Doğru. Kendi etti, kendi buldu."
{n}Yanağından tek bir gözyaşı süzülen genç kadın, usulca başını sallayıp mırıldanmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Fakat... Eskiden kardeşimdi..."

languages.text: {n}La jeune femme hoche faiblement la tête tandis qu'une larme roule sur sa joue. D'une voix blanche, elle balbutie :{/n} « Vous avez raison... C'est lui qui l'a condamné. »
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman nods meekly, and a single tear runs down her cheek. Her voice is hollow when she speaks:{/n} "You're right... He was the one who doomed him."

traits.locale_text: {n}La jeune femme hoche faiblement la tête tandis qu'une larme roule sur sa joue. D'une voix blanche, elle balbutie :{/n} « Vous avez raison... C'est lui qui l'a condamné. »
{n}La jeune femme hoche faiblement la tête tandis qu'une larme roule sur sa joue.{/n} « Mais il... il était... » {n}murmure-t-elle.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die junge Frau nickt zaghaft und eine Träne läuft ihr über die Wange. Ihre Stimme ist hohl, als sie zu sprechen beginnt:{/n} "Ihr habt recht ... Er hat ihn zum Untergang verdammt."
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman nods meekly, and a single tear runs down her cheek. Her voice is hollow when she speaks:{/n} "You're right... He was the one who doomed him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die junge Frau nickt zaghaft und eine Träne läuft ihr über die Wange. Ihre Stimme ist hohl, als sie zu sprechen beginnt:{/n} "Ihr habt recht ... Er hat ihn zum Untergang verdammt."
{n}Die junge Frau nickt schwach, und eine einzelne Träne rollt ihre Wange hinab.{/n} "Aber er ... war es einst ...", {n}presst sie hervor.{/n}
